285    {
286        try {
287            fieldPlayer = PlayerEvent.class.getDeclaredField("player");
288            fieldPlayer.setAccessible(true);
289        } catch (NoSuchFieldException e) {
290            e.printStackTrace();
291        }

293
294    @Inject
295    public PlayerEventListener(
296            final @NonNull PlotAreaManager plotAreaManager,
297            final @NonNull EventDispatcher eventDispatcher,
298            final @NonNull WorldEdit worldEdit,
299            final @NonNull PlotListener plotListener
300    ) {
301        this.eventDispatcher = eventDispatcher;
302        this.worldEdit = worldEdit;
303        this.plotAreaManager = plotAreaManager;
304        this.plotListener = plotListener;
305    }
306
307    @EventHandler(ignoreCancelled = true, priority = EventPriority.LOWEST)
308    public void onBlockBreak(final BlockBreakEvent event) {
309        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getBlock().getLocation());
310        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
311        if (area == null) {
312            return;
313        }
314        Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
315        if (plot != null) {
316            event.setDropItems(plot.getFlag(TileDropFlag.class));
317        }
318    }
319
320    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
321    public void onPlayerDyeSign(PlayerInteractEvent event) {
322        ItemStack itemStack = event.getItem();
323        if (itemStack == null) {
324            return;
325        }
326        Block block = event.getClickedBlock();
327        if (block != null && block.getState() instanceof Sign) {
328            if (DYES.contains(itemStack.getType().toString())) {
329                Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation());
330                PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
331                if (area == null) {
332                    return;
333                }
334                Plot plot = location.getOwnedPlot();
335                if (plot == null) {
336                    if (PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, EditSignFlag.class, false)
337                            && !event.getPlayer().hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_ROAD.toString())) {
338                        event.setCancelled(true);
339                    }
340                    return;
341                }
342                if (plot.isAdded(event.getPlayer().getUniqueId())) {
343                    return; // allow for added players
344                }
345                if (!plot.getFlag(EditSignFlag.class)
346                        && !event.getPlayer().hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_OTHER.toString())) {
347                    plot.debug(event.getPlayer().getName() + " could not color the sign because of edit-sign = false");
348                    event.setCancelled(true);
349                }
350            }
351        }
352    }
353
354    @EventHandler(ignoreCancelled = true)
355    public void onEffect(@NonNull EntityPotionEffectEvent event) {
356        if (Settings.Enabled_Components.DISABLE_BEACON_EFFECT_OVERFLOW ||
357                event.getCause() != EntityPotionEffectEvent.Cause.BEACON ||
358                !(event.getEntity() instanceof Player player)) {
359            return;
360        }
361
362        UUID uuid = player.getUniqueId();
363        PotionEffect effect = event.getNewEffect();
364        if (effect == null) {
365            PotionEffect oldEffect = event.getOldEffect();
366            if (oldEffect != null) {
367                String name = oldEffect.getType().getName();
368                plotListener.addEffect(uuid, name, -1);
369            }
370        } else {
371            long expiresAt = System.currentTimeMillis() + effect.getDuration() * 50L; //Convert ticks to milliseconds
372            String name = effect.getType().getName();
373            plotListener.addEffect(uuid, name, expiresAt);
374        }
375    }
376
377    @EventHandler
378    public void onVehicleEntityCollision(VehicleEntityCollisionEvent e) {
379        if (e.getVehicle() instanceof Boat) {
380            Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(e.getEntity().getLocation());
381            if (location.isPlotArea()) {
382                if (e.getEntity() instanceof Player) {
383                    PlotPlayer<Player> player = BukkitUtil.adapt((Player) e.getEntity());
384                    Plot plot = player.getCurrentPlot();
385                    if (plot != null) {
386                        if (!plot.isAdded(player.getUUID())) {
387                            //Here the event is only canceled if the player is not the owner
388                            //of the property on which he is located.
389                            e.setCancelled(true);
390                        }
391                    } else {
392                        e.setCancelled(true);
393                    }
394                } else {
395                    //Here the event is cancelled too, otherwise you can move the
396                    //boat with EchoPets or other mobs running around on the plot.
397                    e.setCancelled(true);
398                }
399            }
400        }
401    }
402
403    @EventHandler(ignoreCancelled = true, priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST)
404    public void playerCommand(PlayerCommandPreprocessEvent event) {
405        String msg = event.getMessage().replace("/", "").toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT).trim();
406        if (msg.isEmpty()) {
407            return;
408        }
409        Player player = event.getPlayer();
410        PlotPlayer<Player> plotPlayer = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
411        Location location = plotPlayer.getLocation();
412        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
413        if (area == null) {
414            return;
415        }
416        String[] parts = msg.split(" ");
417        Plot plot = plotPlayer.getCurrentPlot();
418        // Check WorldEdit
419        switch (parts[0]) {
420            case "up", "worldedit:up" -> {
421                if (plot == null || (!plot.isAdded(plotPlayer.getUUID()) && !plotPlayer.hasPermission(
422                        Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER,
423                        true
424                ))) {
425                    event.setCancelled(true);
426                    return;
427                }
428            }
429        }
430        if (plot == null && !area.isRoadFlags()) {
431            return;
432        }
433
434        List<String> blockedCommands = plot != null ?
435                plot.getFlag(BlockedCmdsFlag.class) :
436                area.getFlag(BlockedCmdsFlag.class);
437        if (blockedCommands.isEmpty()) {
438            return;
439        }
440        if (plotPlayer.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_BLOCKED_CMDS)) {
441            return;
442        }
443        // When using namespaced commands, we're not interested in the namespace
444        String part = parts[0];
445        if (part.contains(":")) {
446            String[] namespaced = part.split(":");
447            part = namespaced[1];
448            msg = msg.substring(namespaced[0].length() + 1);
449        }
450        msg = replaceAliases(msg, part);
451        for (String blocked : blockedCommands) {
452            if (blocked.equalsIgnoreCase(msg)) {
453                String perm;
454                if (plot != null && plot.isAdded(plotPlayer.getUUID())) {
455                    perm = "plots.admin.command.blocked-cmds.shared";
456                } else {
457                    perm = "plots.admin.command.blocked-cmds.road";
458                }
459                if (!plotPlayer.hasPermission(perm)) {
460                    plotPlayer.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("blockedcmds.command_blocked"));
461                    event.setCancelled(true);
462                }
463                return;
464            }
465        }
466    }
467
468    private String replaceAliases(String msg, String part) {
469        String s1 = part;
470        Set<String> aliases = new HashSet<>();
471        for (HelpTopic cmdLabel : Bukkit.getServer().getHelpMap().getHelpTopics()) {
472            if (part.equals(cmdLabel.getName())) {
473                break;
474            }
475            String label = cmdLabel.getName().replaceFirst("/", "");
476            if (aliases.contains(label)) {
477                continue;
478            }
479            PluginCommand p = Bukkit.getPluginCommand(label);
480            if (p != null) {
481                for (String a : p.getAliases()) {
482                    if (aliases.contains(a)) {
483                        continue;
484                    }
485                    aliases.add(a);
486                    a = a.replaceFirst("/", "");
487                    if (!a.equals(label) && a.equals(part)) {
488                        part = label;
489                        break;
490                    }
491                }
492            }
493        }
494        if (!s1.equals(part)) {
495            msg = msg.replace(s1, part);
496        }
497        return msg;
498    }
499
500    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
501    public void onPreLogin(final AsyncPlayerPreLoginEvent event) {
502        final UUID uuid;
503        if (Settings.UUID.OFFLINE) {
504            if (Settings.UUID.FORCE_LOWERCASE) {
505                uuid = UUID.nameUUIDFromBytes(("OfflinePlayer:" + event.getName().toLowerCase()).getBytes(Charsets.UTF_8));
506            } else {
507                uuid = UUID.nameUUIDFromBytes(("OfflinePlayer:" + event.getName()).getBytes(Charsets.UTF_8));
508            }
509        } else {
510            uuid = event.getUniqueId();
511        }
512        PlotSquared.get().getImpromptuUUIDPipeline().storeImmediately(event.getName(), uuid);
513    }
514
515    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
516    @SuppressWarnings("deprecation") // Paper deprecation
517    public void onConnect(PlayerJoinEvent event) {
518        final Player player = event.getPlayer();
519        PlotSquared.platform().playerManager().removePlayer(player.getUniqueId());
520        final PlotPlayer<Player> pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
521
522        // we're stripping the country code as we don't want to differ between countries
523        pp.setLocale(Locale.forLanguageTag(player.getLocale().substring(0, 2)));
524
525        Location location = pp.getLocation();
526        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
527        if (area != null) {
528            Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
529            if (plot != null) {
530                plotListener.plotEntry(pp, plot);
531            }
532        }
533        // Delayed
534
535        // Async
536        TaskManager.runTaskLaterAsync(() -> {
537            if (!player.hasPlayedBefore() && player.isOnline()) {
538                player.saveData();
539            }
540            this.eventDispatcher.doJoinTask(pp);
541        }, TaskTime.seconds(1L));
542
543        if (pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_UPDATE_NOTIFICATION.toString()) && Settings.Enabled_Components.UPDATE_NOTIFICATIONS
544                && PremiumVerification.isPremium() && UpdateUtility.hasUpdate) {
545            Caption boundary = TranslatableCaption.of("update.update_boundary");
546            Caption updateNotification = TranslatableCaption.of("update.update_notification");
547            pp.sendMessage(boundary);
548            pp.sendMessage(
549                    updateNotification,
550                    TagResolver.builder()
551                            .tag("p2version", Tag.inserting(Component.text(UpdateUtility.internalVersion.versionString())))
552                            .tag("spigotversion", Tag.inserting(Component.text(UpdateUtility.spigotVersion)))
553                            .tag("downloadurl", Tag.preProcessParsed("https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/77506/updates"))
554                            .build()
555            );
556            pp.sendMessage(boundary);
557        }
558    }
559
560    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
561    public void playerRespawn(PlayerRespawnEvent event) {
562        Player player = event.getPlayer();
563        PlotPlayer<Player> pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
564        this.eventDispatcher.doRespawnTask(pp);
565    }

567    @SuppressWarnings("deprecation") // We explicitly want #getHomeSynchronous here
568    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
569    public void onTeleport(PlayerTeleportEvent event) {
570        Player player = event.getPlayer();
571        //We need to account for bad plugins like NoCheatPlus that teleports player on/before login -_-
572        if (!player.isOnline()) {
573            return;
574        }
575        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
576        try (final MetaDataAccess<Plot> lastPlotAccess =
577                     pp.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_LAST_PLOT)) {
578            Plot lastPlot = lastPlotAccess.get().orElse(null);
579            org.bukkit.Location to = event.getTo();
580            //noinspection ConstantConditions
581            if (to != null) {
582                Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(to);
583                PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
584                if (area == null) {
585                    if (lastPlot != null) {
586                        plotListener.plotExit(pp, lastPlot);
587                        lastPlotAccess.remove();
588                    }
589                    try (final MetaDataAccess<Location> lastLocationAccess =
590                                 pp.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_LOCATION)) {
591                        lastLocationAccess.remove();
592                    }
593                    return;
594                }
595                Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
596                if (plot != null) {
597                    final boolean result = DenyTeleportFlag.allowsTeleport(pp, plot);
598                    // there is one possibility to still allow teleportation:
599                    // to is identical to the plot's home location, and untrusted-visit is true
600                    // i.e. untrusted-visit can override deny-teleport
601                    // this is acceptable, because otherwise it wouldn't make sense to have both flags set
602                    if (result || (plot.getFlag(UntrustedVisitFlag.class) && plot.getHomeSynchronous().equals(BukkitUtil.adaptComplete(to)))) {
603                        plotListener.plotEntry(pp, plot);
604                    } else {
605                        pp.sendMessage(
606                                TranslatableCaption.of("deny.no_enter"),
607                                TagResolver.resolver("plot", Tag.inserting(Component.text(plot.toString())))
608                        );
609                        event.setCancelled(true);
610                    }
611                }
612            }
613        }
614        playerMove(event);
615    }
616
617    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
618    public void onWorldChanged(PlayerChangedWorldEvent event) {
619        Player player = event.getPlayer();
620        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
621        if (this.worldEdit != null) {
622            if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_WORLDEDIT_BYPASS)) {
623                if (pp.getAttribute("worldedit")) {
624                    pp.removeAttribute("worldedit");
625                }
626            }
627        }
628    }
629
630    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
631    public void vehicleMove(VehicleMoveEvent event)
632            throws IllegalAccessException {
633        final org.bukkit.Location from = event.getFrom();
634        final org.bukkit.Location to = event.getTo();
635
636        int toX, toZ;
637        if ((toX = MathMan.roundInt(to.getX())) != MathMan.roundInt(from.getX()) | (toZ = MathMan.roundInt(to.getZ())) != MathMan
638                .roundInt(from.getZ())) {
639            Vehicle vehicle = event.getVehicle();
640
641            // Check allowed
642            if (!vehicle.getPassengers().isEmpty()) {
643                Entity passenger = vehicle.getPassengers().get(0);
644
645                if (passenger instanceof final Player player) {
646                    // reset
647                    if (moveTmp == null) {
648                        moveTmp = new PlayerMoveEvent(null, from, to);
649                    }
650                    moveTmp.setFrom(from);
651                    moveTmp.setTo(to);
652                    moveTmp.setCancelled(false);
653                    fieldPlayer.set(moveTmp, player);
654
655                    List<Entity> passengers = vehicle.getPassengers();
656
657                    this.playerMove(moveTmp);
658                    org.bukkit.Location dest;
659                    if (moveTmp.isCancelled()) {
660                        dest = from;
661                    } else if (MathMan.roundInt(moveTmp.getTo().getX()) != toX || MathMan.roundInt(moveTmp
662                            .getTo()
663                            .getZ()) != toZ) {
664                        dest = to;
665                    } else {
666                        dest = null;
667                    }
668                    if (dest != null) {
669                        vehicle.eject();
670                        vehicle.setVelocity(new Vector(0d, 0d, 0d));
671                        PaperLib.teleportAsync(vehicle, dest);
672                        passengers.forEach(vehicle::addPassenger);
673                        return;
674                    }
675                }
676                if (Settings.Enabled_Components.KILL_ROAD_VEHICLES) {
677                    final com.sk89q.worldedit.world.entity.EntityType entityType = BukkitAdapter.adapt(vehicle.getType());
678                    // Horses etc are vehicles, but they're also animals
679                    // so this filters out all living entities
680                    if (EntityCategories.VEHICLE.contains(entityType) && !EntityCategories.ANIMAL.contains(entityType)) {
681                        List<MetadataValue> meta = vehicle.getMetadata("plot");
682                        Plot toPlot = BukkitUtil.adapt(to).getPlot();
683                        if (!meta.isEmpty()) {
684                            Plot origin = (Plot) meta.get(0).value();
685                            if (origin != null && !origin.getBasePlot(false).equals(toPlot)) {
686                                vehicle.remove();
687                            }
688                        } else if (toPlot != null) {
689                            vehicle.setMetadata("plot", new FixedMetadataValue((Plugin) PlotSquared.platform(), toPlot));
690                        }
691                    }
692                }
693            }
694
695        }
696    }
697
698    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
699    public void playerMove(PlayerMoveEvent event) {
700        org.bukkit.Location from = event.getFrom();
701        org.bukkit.Location to = event.getTo();
702        int x2;
703        if (MathMan.roundInt(from.getX()) != (x2 = MathMan.roundInt(to.getX()))) {
704            Player player = event.getPlayer();
705            BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
706            // Cancel teleport
707            if (TaskManager.removeFromTeleportQueue(pp.getName())) {
708                pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("teleport.teleport_failed"));
709            }
710            // Set last location
711            Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(to);
712            try (final MetaDataAccess<Location> lastLocationAccess =
713                         pp.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_LOCATION)) {
714                lastLocationAccess.remove();
715            }
716            PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
717            if (area == null) {
718                try (final MetaDataAccess<Plot> lastPlotAccess =
719                             pp.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_LAST_PLOT)) {
720                    lastPlotAccess.remove();
721                }
722                return;
723            }
724            Plot now = area.getPlot(location);
725            Plot lastPlot;
726            try (final MetaDataAccess<Plot> lastPlotAccess =
727                         pp.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_LAST_PLOT)) {
728                lastPlot = lastPlotAccess.get().orElse(null);
729            }
730            if (now == null) {
731                try (final MetaDataAccess<Boolean> kickAccess =
732                             pp.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_KICK)) {
733                    if (lastPlot != null && !plotListener.plotExit(pp, lastPlot) && this.tmpTeleport && !kickAccess.get().orElse(
734                            false)) {
735                        pp.sendMessage(
736                                TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
737                                TagResolver.resolver(
738                                        "node",
739                                        Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_EXIT_DENIED)
740                                )
741                        );
742                        this.tmpTeleport = false;
743                        if (lastPlot.equals(BukkitUtil.adapt(from).getPlot())) {
744                            player.teleport(from);
745                        } else {
746                            player.teleport(player.getWorld().getSpawnLocation());
747                        }
748                        this.tmpTeleport = true;
749                        event.setCancelled(true);
750                        return;
751                    }
752                }
753            } else if (now.equals(lastPlot)) {
754                ForceFieldListener.handleForcefield(player, pp, now);
755            } else if (!plotListener.plotEntry(pp, now) && this.tmpTeleport) {
756                pp.sendMessage(
757                        TranslatableCaption.of("deny.no_enter"),
758                        TagResolver.resolver("plot", Tag.inserting(Component.text(now.toString())))
759                );
760                this.tmpTeleport = false;
761                to.setX(from.getBlockX());
762                to.setY(from.getBlockY());
763                to.setZ(from.getBlockZ());
764                player.teleport(event.getTo());
765                this.tmpTeleport = true;
766                return;
767            }
768            int border = area.getBorder(true);
769            int x1;
770            if (x2 > border && this.tmpTeleport) {
771                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BYPASS_BORDER)) {
772                    to.setX(border - 1);
773                    this.tmpTeleport = false;
774                    player.teleport(event.getTo());
775                    this.tmpTeleport = true;
776                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("border.denied"));
777                } else if (MathMan.roundInt(from.getX()) <= border) { // Only send if they just moved out of the border
778                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("border.bypass.exited"));
779                }
780            } else if (x2 < -border && this.tmpTeleport) {
781                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BYPASS_BORDER)) {
782                    to.setX(-border + 1);
783                    this.tmpTeleport = false;
784                    player.teleport(event.getTo());
785                    this.tmpTeleport = true;
786                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("border.denied"));
787                } else if (MathMan.roundInt(from.getX()) >= -border) { // Only send if they just moved out of the border
788                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("border.bypass.exited"));
789                }
790            } else if (((x1 = MathMan.roundInt(from.getX())) >= border && x2 <= border) || (x1 <= -border && x2 >= -border)) {
791                if (pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BYPASS_BORDER)) {
792                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("border.bypass.entered"));
793                }
794            }
795        }
796        int z2;
797        if (MathMan.roundInt(from.getZ()) != (z2 = MathMan.roundInt(to.getZ()))) {
798            Player player = event.getPlayer();
799            BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
800            // Cancel teleport
801            if (TaskManager.removeFromTeleportQueue(pp.getName())) {
802                pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("teleport.teleport_failed"));
803            }
804            // Set last location
805            Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(to);
806            try (final MetaDataAccess<Location> lastLocationAccess =
807                         pp.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_LOCATION)) {
808                lastLocationAccess.set(location);
809            }
810            PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
811            if (area == null) {
812                try (final MetaDataAccess<Plot> lastPlotAccess =
813                             pp.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_LAST_PLOT)) {
814                    lastPlotAccess.remove();
815                }
816                return;
817            }
818            Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
819            Plot lastPlot;
820            try (final MetaDataAccess<Plot> lastPlotAccess =
821                         pp.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_LAST_PLOT)) {
822                lastPlot = lastPlotAccess.get().orElse(null);
823            }
824            if (plot == null) {
825                try (final MetaDataAccess<Boolean> kickAccess =
826                             pp.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_KICK)) {
827                    if (lastPlot != null && !plotListener.plotExit(pp, lastPlot) && this.tmpTeleport && !kickAccess.get().orElse(
828                            false)) {
829                        pp.sendMessage(
830                                TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
831                                TagResolver.resolver(
832                                        "node",
833                                        Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_EXIT_DENIED)
834                                )
835                        );
836                        this.tmpTeleport = false;
837                        if (lastPlot.equals(BukkitUtil.adapt(from).getPlot())) {
838                            player.teleport(from);
839                        } else {
840                            player.teleport(player.getWorld().getSpawnLocation());
841                        }
842                        this.tmpTeleport = true;
843                        event.setCancelled(true);
844                        return;
845                    }
846                }
847            } else if (plot.equals(lastPlot)) {
848                ForceFieldListener.handleForcefield(player, pp, plot);
849            } else if (!plotListener.plotEntry(pp, plot) && this.tmpTeleport) {
850                pp.sendMessage(
851                        TranslatableCaption.of("deny.no_enter"),
852                        TagResolver.resolver("plot", Tag.inserting(Component.text(plot.toString())))
853                );
854                this.tmpTeleport = false;
855                player.teleport(from);
856                to.setX(from.getBlockX());
857                to.setY(from.getBlockY());
858                to.setZ(from.getBlockZ());
859                player.teleport(event.getTo());
860                this.tmpTeleport = true;
861                return;
862            }
863            int border = area.getBorder(true);
864            int z1;
865            if (z2 > border && this.tmpTeleport) {
866                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BYPASS_BORDER)) {
867                    to.setZ(border - 1);
868                    this.tmpTeleport = false;
869                    player.teleport(event.getTo());
870                    this.tmpTeleport = true;
871                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("border.denied"));
872                } else if (MathMan.roundInt(from.getZ()) <= border) { // Only send if they just moved out of the border
873                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("border.bypass.exited"));
874                }
875            } else if (z2 < -border && this.tmpTeleport) {
876                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BYPASS_BORDER)) {
877                    to.setZ(-border + 1);
878                    this.tmpTeleport = false;
879                    player.teleport(event.getTo());
880                    this.tmpTeleport = true;
881                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("border.denied"));
882                } else if (MathMan.roundInt(from.getZ()) >= -border) { // Only send if they just moved out of the border
883                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("border.bypass.exited"));
884                }
885            } else if (((z1 = MathMan.roundInt(from.getZ())) >= border && z2 <= border) || (z1 <= -border && z2 >= -border)) {
886                if (pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BYPASS_BORDER)) {
887                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("border.bypass.entered"));
888                }
889            }
890        }
891    }
892
893    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.LOW)
894    @SuppressWarnings("deprecation") // Paper deprecation
895    public void onChat(AsyncPlayerChatEvent event) {
896        if (event.isCancelled()) {
897            return;
898        }
899
900        BukkitPlayer plotPlayer = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getPlayer());
901        Location location = plotPlayer.getLocation();
902        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
903        if (area == null) {
904            return;
905        }
906        Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
907        if (plot == null) {
908            return;
909        }
910        if (!((plot.getFlag(ChatFlag.class) && area.isPlotChat() && plotPlayer.getAttribute("chat"))
911                || area.isForcingPlotChat())) {
912            return;
913        }
914        if (plot.isDenied(plotPlayer.getUUID()) && !plotPlayer.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_CHAT_BYPASS)) {
915            return;
916        }
917        event.setCancelled(true);
918        Set<Player> recipients = event.getRecipients();
919        recipients.clear();
920        Set<PlotPlayer<?>> spies = new HashSet<>();
921        Set<PlotPlayer<?>> plotRecipients = new HashSet<>();
922        for (final PlotPlayer<?> pp : PlotSquared.platform().playerManager().getPlayers()) {
923            if (pp.getAttribute("chatspy")) {
924                spies.add(pp);
925            } else {
926                Plot current = pp.getCurrentPlot();
927                if (current != null && current.getBasePlot(false).equals(plot)) {
928                    plotRecipients.add(pp);
929                }
930            }
931        }
932        String message = event.getMessage();
933        String sender = event.getPlayer().getDisplayName();
934        PlotId id = plot.getId();
935        String worldName = plot.getWorldName();
936        Caption msg = TranslatableCaption.of("chat.plot_chat_format");
937        TagResolver.Builder builder = TagResolver.builder();
938        builder.tag("world", Tag.inserting(Component.text(worldName)));
939        builder.tag("plot_id", Tag.inserting(Component.text(id.toString())));
940        builder.tag("sender", Tag.inserting(Component.text(sender)));
941        if (plotPlayer.hasPermission("plots.chat.color")) {
942            builder.tag("msg", Tag.inserting(MiniMessage.miniMessage().deserialize(
943                    message,
944                    TagResolver.resolver(StandardTags.color(), StandardTags.gradient(),
945                            StandardTags.rainbow(), StandardTags.decorations()
946                    )
947            )));
948        } else {
949            builder.tag("msg", Tag.inserting(Component.text(message)));
950        }
951        for (PlotPlayer<?> receiver : plotRecipients) {
952            receiver.sendMessage(msg, builder.build());
953        }
954        if (!spies.isEmpty()) {
955            Caption spymsg = TranslatableCaption.of("chat.plot_chat_spy_format");
956            for (PlotPlayer<?> player : spies) {
957                player.sendMessage(spymsg, builder.tag("message", Tag.inserting(Component.text(message))).build());
958            }
959        }
960        if (Settings.Chat.LOG_PLOTCHAT_TO_CONSOLE) {
961            Caption spymsg = TranslatableCaption.of("chat.plot_chat_spy_format");
962            ConsolePlayer.getConsole().sendMessage(
963                    spymsg,
964                    builder.tag("message", Tag.inserting(Component.text(message))).build()
965            );
966        }
967    }
968
969    @SuppressWarnings("deprecation")
970    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
971    public void onInventoryClick(InventoryClickEvent event) {
972        /*if (!event.isLeftClick() || (event.getAction() != InventoryAction.PLACE_ALL) || event
973            .isShiftClick()) {
974            return;
975        }*/
976        HumanEntity entity = event.getWhoClicked();
977        if (!(entity instanceof Player) || !this.plotAreaManager
978                .hasPlotArea(entity.getWorld().getName())) {
979            return;
980        }
981
982        HumanEntity clicker = event.getWhoClicked();
983        if (!(clicker instanceof Player player)) {
984            return;
985        }
986        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
987        final PlotInventory inventory = PlotInventory.getOpenPlotInventory(pp);
988        if (inventory != null && event.getRawSlot() == event.getSlot()) {
989            if (!inventory.onClick(event.getSlot())) {
990                event.setResult(Event.Result.DENY);
991                event.setCancelled(true);
992                inventory.close();
993            }
994        }
995        PlayerInventory inv = player.getInventory();
996        int slot = inv.getHeldItemSlot();
997        if ((slot > 8) || !event.getEventName().equals("InventoryCreativeEvent")) {
998            return;
999        }
1000        ItemStack oldItem = inv.getItemInHand();
1001        ItemMeta oldMeta = oldItem.getItemMeta();
1002        ItemStack newItem = event.getCursor();
1003        ItemMeta newMeta = newItem.getItemMeta();
1004
1005        if (event.getClick() == ClickType.CREATIVE) {
1006            final Plot plot = pp.getCurrentPlot();
1007            if (plot != null) {
1008                if (plot.getFlag(PreventCreativeCopyFlag.class) && !plot
1009                        .isAdded(player.getUniqueId()) && !pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_OTHER)) {
1010                    final ItemStack newStack =
1011                            new ItemStack(newItem.getType(), newItem.getAmount());
1012                    event.setCursor(newStack);
1013                    plot.debug(player.getName()
1014                            + " could not creative-copy an item because prevent-creative-copy = true");
1015                }
1016            } else {
1017                PlotArea area = pp.getPlotAreaAbs();
1018                if (area != null && PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, PreventCreativeCopyFlag.class, true)) {
1019                    final ItemStack newStack =
1020                            new ItemStack(newItem.getType(), newItem.getAmount());
1021                    event.setCursor(newStack);
1022                }
1023            }
1024            return;
1025        }
1026
1027        String newLore = "";
1028        if (newMeta != null) {
1029            List<String> lore = newMeta.getLore();
1030            if (lore != null) {
1031                newLore = lore.toString();
1032            }
1033        }
1034        String oldLore = "";
1035        if (oldMeta != null) {
1036            List<String> lore = oldMeta.getLore();
1037            if (lore != null) {
1038                oldLore = lore.toString();
1039            }
1040        }
1041        Material itemType = newItem.getType();
1042        if (!"[(+NBT)]".equals(newLore) || (oldItem.equals(newItem) && newLore.equals(oldLore))) {
1043            if (newMeta == null || (itemType != Material.LEGACY_BANNER && itemType != Material.PLAYER_HEAD)) {
1044                return;
1045            }
1046        }
1047        Block block = player.getTargetBlock(null, 7);
1048        org.bukkit.block.BlockState state = block.getState();
1049        Material stateType = state.getType();
1050        if (stateType != itemType) {
1051            if (stateType == Material.LEGACY_WALL_BANNER || stateType == Material.LEGACY_STANDING_BANNER) {
1052                if (itemType != Material.LEGACY_BANNER) {
1053                    return;
1054                }
1055            } else if (stateType == Material.LEGACY_SKULL) {
1056                if (itemType != Material.LEGACY_SKULL_ITEM) {
1057                    return;
1058                }
1059            } else {
1060                return;
1061            }
1062        }
1063        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(state.getLocation());
1064        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1065        if (area == null) {
1066            return;
1067        }
1068        Plot plot = area.getPlotAbs(location);
1069        boolean cancelled = false;
1070        if (plot == null) {
1071            if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_ROAD)) {
1072                pp.sendMessage(
1073                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1074                        TagResolver.resolver(
1075                                "node",
1076                                Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_ROAD)
1077                        )
1078                );
1079                cancelled = true;
1080            }
1081        } else if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
1082            if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_UNOWNED)) {
1083                pp.sendMessage(
1084                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1085                        TagResolver.resolver(
1086                                "node",
1087                                Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_UNOWNED)
1088                        )
1089                );
1090                cancelled = true;
1091            }
1092        } else {
1093            UUID uuid = pp.getUUID();
1094            if (!plot.isAdded(uuid)) {
1095                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_OTHER)) {
1096                    pp.sendMessage(
1097                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1098                            TagResolver.resolver(
1099                                    "node",
1100                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_OTHER)
1101                            )
1102                    );
1103                    cancelled = true;
1104                }
1105            }
1106        }
1107        if (cancelled) {
1108            if ((oldItem.getType() == newItem.getType()) && (oldItem.getDurability() == newItem
1109                    .getDurability())) {
1110                event.setCursor(
1111                        new ItemStack(newItem.getType(), newItem.getAmount(), newItem.getDurability()));
1112                event.setCancelled(true);
1113                return;
1114            }
1115            event.setCursor(
1116                    new ItemStack(newItem.getType(), newItem.getAmount(), newItem.getDurability()));
1117        }
1118    }
1119
1120    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
1121    public void onInteract(PlayerInteractAtEntityEvent e) {
1122        Entity entity = e.getRightClicked();
1123        if (!(entity instanceof ArmorStand) && !(entity instanceof ItemFrame)) {
1124            return;
1125        }
1126        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(e.getRightClicked().getLocation());
1127        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1128        if (area == null) {
1129            return;
1130        }
1131        EntitySpawnListener.testNether(entity);
1132        Plot plot = location.getPlotAbs();
1133        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(e.getPlayer());
1134        if (plot == null) {
1135            if (!PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, MiscInteractFlag.class, true) && !pp.hasPermission(
1136                    Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_ROAD
1137            )) {
1138                pp.sendMessage(
1139                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1140                        TagResolver.resolver(
1141                                "node",
1142                                Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_ROAD)
1143                        )
1144                );
1145                e.setCancelled(true);
1146            }
1147        } else {
1148            if (Settings.Done.RESTRICT_BUILDING && DoneFlag.isDone(plot)) {
1149                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER)) {
1150                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("done.building_restricted"));
1151                    e.setCancelled(true);
1152                    return;
1153                }
1154            }
1155            if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
1156                if (!pp.hasPermission("plots.admin.interact.unowned")) {
1157                    pp.sendMessage(
1158                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1159                            TagResolver.resolver(
1160                                    "node",
1161                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_UNOWNED)
1162                            )
1163                    );
1164                    e.setCancelled(true);
1165                }
1166            } else {
1167                UUID uuid = pp.getUUID();
1168                if (plot.isAdded(uuid)) {
1169                    return;
1170                }
1171                if (plot.getFlag(MiscInteractFlag.class)) {
1172                    return;
1173                }
1174                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_OTHER)) {
1175                    pp.sendMessage(
1176                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1177                            TagResolver.resolver(
1178                                    "node",
1179                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_OTHER)
1180                            )
1181                    );
1182                    e.setCancelled(true);
1183                    plot.debug(pp.getName() + " could not interact with " + entity.getType()
1184                            + " because misc-interact = false");
1185                }
1186            }
1187        }
1188    }

1190    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.LOW)
1191    @SuppressWarnings("deprecation") // Paper deprecation
1192    public void onCancelledInteract(PlayerInteractEvent event) {
1193        if (event.isCancelled() && event.getAction() == Action.RIGHT_CLICK_AIR) {
1194            Player player = event.getPlayer();
1195            BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
1196            PlotArea area = pp.getPlotAreaAbs();
1197            if (area == null) {
1198                return;
1199            }
1200            if (event.getAction() == Action.RIGHT_CLICK_AIR) {
1201                Material item = event.getMaterial();
1202                if (item.toString().toLowerCase().endsWith("_egg")) {
1203                    event.setCancelled(true);
1204                    event.setUseItemInHand(Event.Result.DENY);
1205                }
1206            }
1207            ItemStack hand = player.getInventory().getItemInMainHand();
1208            ItemStack offHand = player.getInventory().getItemInOffHand();
1209            Material type = hand.getType();
1210            Material offType = offHand.getType();
1211            if (type == Material.AIR) {
1212                type = offType;
1213            }
1214            if (type.toString().toLowerCase().endsWith("_egg")) {
1215                Block block = player.getTargetBlockExact(5, FluidCollisionMode.SOURCE_ONLY);
1216                if (block != null && block.getType() != Material.AIR) {
1217                    Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation());
1218                    if (!this.eventDispatcher.checkPlayerBlockEvent(pp, PlayerBlockEventType.SPAWN_MOB, location, null, true)) {
1219                        event.setCancelled(true);
1220                        event.setUseItemInHand(Event.Result.DENY);
1221                    }
1222                }
1223            }
1224        }
1225    }
1226
1227    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.LOW, ignoreCancelled = true)
1228    public void onInteract(PlayerInteractEvent event) {
1229        Player player = event.getPlayer();
1230        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
1231        PlotArea area = pp.getPlotAreaAbs();
1232        if (area == null) {
1233            return;
1234        }
1235        PlayerBlockEventType eventType;
1236        BlockType blocktype1;
1237        Block block = event.getClickedBlock();
1238        if (block == null) {
1239            // We do not care in this case, the player is likely interacting with air ("nothing").
1240            return;
1241        }
1242        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation());
1243        Action action = event.getAction();
1244        switch (action) {
1245            case PHYSICAL -> {
1246                eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.TRIGGER_PHYSICAL;
1247                blocktype1 = BukkitAdapter.asBlockType(block.getType());
1248            }
1249
1250            //todo rearrange the right click code. it is all over the place.
1251            case RIGHT_CLICK_BLOCK -> {
1252                Material blockType = block.getType();
1253                eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.INTERACT_BLOCK;
1254                blocktype1 = BukkitAdapter.asBlockType(block.getType());
1255
1256                if (INTERACTABLE_MATERIALS != null ? INTERACTABLE_MATERIALS.contains(blockType.name()) : blockType.isInteractable()) {
1257                    if (!player.isSneaking()) {
1258                        break;
1259                    }
1260                    ItemStack hand = player.getInventory().getItemInMainHand();
1261                    ItemStack offHand = player.getInventory().getItemInOffHand();
1262
1263                    // sneaking players interact with blocks if both hands are empty
1264                    if (hand.getType() == Material.AIR && offHand.getType() == Material.AIR) {
1265                        break;
1266                    }
1267                }
1268
1269                Material type = event.getMaterial();
1270
1271                // in the following, lb needs to have the material of the item in hand i.e. type
1272                switch (type.toString()) {
1273                    case "REDSTONE", "STRING", "PUMPKIN_SEEDS", "MELON_SEEDS", "COCOA_BEANS", "WHEAT_SEEDS", "BEETROOT_SEEDS",
1274                            "SWEET_BERRIES", "GLOW_BERRIES" -> {
1275                        return;
1276                    }
1277                    default -> {
1278                        //eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.PLACE_BLOCK;
1279                        if (type.isBlock()) {
1280                            return;
1281                        }
1282                    }
1283                }
1284                if (PaperLib.isPaper()) {
1285                    if (MaterialTags.SPAWN_EGGS.isTagged(type) || Material.EGG.equals(type)) {
1286                        eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.SPAWN_MOB;
1287                        break;
1288                    }
1289                } else {
1290                    if (type.toString().toLowerCase().endsWith("egg")) {
1291                        eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.SPAWN_MOB;
1292                        break;
1293                    }
1294                }
1295                if (type.isEdible()) {
1296                    //Allow all players to eat while also allowing the block place event to be fired
1297                    return;
1298                }
1299                if (type == Material.ARMOR_STAND) {
1300                    location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getRelative(event.getBlockFace()).getLocation());
1301                    eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.PLACE_MISC;
1302                }
1303                if (org.bukkit.Tag.ITEMS_BOATS.isTagged(type) || MINECARTS.contains(type)) {
1304                    eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.PLACE_VEHICLE;
1305                    break;
1306                }
1307                if (type == Material.FIREWORK_ROCKET || type == Material.FIREWORK_STAR) {
1308                    eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.SPAWN_MOB;
1309                    break;
1310                }
1311                if (BOOKS.contains(type)) {
1312                    eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.READ;
1313                    break;
1314                }
1315            }
1316            case LEFT_CLICK_BLOCK -> {
1317                Material blockType = block.getType();
1318
1319                // todo: when the code above is rearranged, it would be great to beautify this as well.
1320                // will code this as a temporary, specific bug fix (for dragon eggs)
1321                if (blockType != Material.DRAGON_EGG) {
1322                    return;
1323                }
1324
1325                eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.INTERACT_BLOCK;
1326                blocktype1 = BukkitAdapter.asBlockType(block.getType());
1327            }
1328            default -> {
1329                return;
1330            }
1331        }
1332        if (this.worldEdit != null && pp.getAttribute("worldedit")) {
1333            if (event.getMaterial() == Material.getMaterial(this.worldEdit.getConfiguration().wandItem)) {
1334                return;
1335            }
1336        }
1337        if (!this.eventDispatcher.checkPlayerBlockEvent(pp, eventType, location, blocktype1, true)) {
1338            event.setCancelled(true);
1339            event.setUseInteractedBlock(Event.Result.DENY);
1340        }
1341    }
1342
1343    // Boats can sometimes be placed on interactable blocks such as levers,
1344    // see PS-175. Armor stands, minecarts and end crystals (the other entities
1345    // supported by this event) don't have this issue.
1346    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.LOW, ignoreCancelled = true)
1347    public void onBoatPlace(EntityPlaceEvent event) {
1348        Player player = event.getPlayer();
1349        if (player == null) {
1350            return;
1351        }
1352        Entity placed = event.getEntity();
1353        if (!(placed instanceof Boat)) {
1354            return;
1355        }
1356        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getPlayer());
1357        PlotArea area = pp.getPlotAreaAbs();
1358        if (area == null) {
1359            return;
1360        }
1361        PlayerBlockEventType eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.PLACE_VEHICLE;
1362        Block block = event.getBlock();
1363        BlockType blockType = BukkitAdapter.asBlockType(block.getType());
1364        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation());
1365        if (!PlotSquared.get().getEventDispatcher()
1366                .checkPlayerBlockEvent(pp, eventType, location, blockType, true)) {
1367            event.setCancelled(true);
1368        }
1369    }
1370
1371    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
1372    public void onBucketEmpty(PlayerBucketEmptyEvent event) {
1373        BlockFace bf = event.getBlockFace();
1374        // Note: a month after Bukkit 1.14.4 released, they added the API method
1375        // PlayerBucketEmptyEvent#getBlock(), which returns the block the
1376        // bucket contents is going to be placed at. Currently we determine this
1377        // block ourselves to retain compatibility with 1.13.
1378        final Block block;
1379        // if the block can be waterlogged, the event might waterlog the block
1380        // sometimes
1381        if (event.getBlockClicked().getBlockData() instanceof Waterlogged waterlogged
1382                && !waterlogged.isWaterlogged() && event.getBucket() != Material.LAVA_BUCKET) {
1383            block = event.getBlockClicked();
1384        } else {
1385            block = event.getBlockClicked().getLocation()
1386                    .add(bf.getModX(), bf.getModY(), bf.getModZ())
1387                    .getBlock();
1388        }
1389        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation());
1390        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1391        if (area == null) {
1392            return;
1393        }
1394        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getPlayer());
1395        Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
1396        if (plot == null) {
1397            if (pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_ROAD)) {
1398                return;
1399            }
1400            pp.sendMessage(
1401                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1402                    TagResolver.resolver("node", Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_ROAD))
1403            );
1404            event.setCancelled(true);
1405        } else if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
1406            if (pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_UNOWNED)) {
1407                return;
1408            }
1409            pp.sendMessage(
1410                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1411                    TagResolver.resolver(
1412                            "node",
1413                            Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_UNOWNED)
1414                    )
1415            );
1416            event.setCancelled(true);
1417        } else if (!plot.isAdded(pp.getUUID())) {
1418            if (pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER)) {
1419                return;
1420            }
1421            pp.sendMessage(
1422                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1423                    TagResolver.resolver(
1424                            "node",
1425                            Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER)
1426                    )
1427            );
1428            event.setCancelled(true);
1429        } else if (Settings.Done.RESTRICT_BUILDING && DoneFlag.isDone(plot)) {
1430            if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER)) {
1431                pp.sendMessage(
1432                        TranslatableCaption.of("done.building_restricted")
1433                );
1434                event.setCancelled(true);
1435            }
1436        }
1437    }

1439    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST)
1440    public void onInventoryClose(InventoryCloseEvent event) {
1441        HumanEntity closer = event.getPlayer();
1442        if (!(closer instanceof Player player)) {
1443            return;
1444        }
1445        PlotInventory.removePlotInventoryOpen(BukkitUtil.adapt(player));
1446    }

1448    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.MONITOR)
1449    public void onLeave(PlayerQuitEvent event) {
1450        TaskManager.removeFromTeleportQueue(event.getPlayer().getName());
1451        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getPlayer());
1452        pp.unregister();
1453        plotListener.logout(pp.getUUID());
1454    }

1456    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
1457    public void onBucketFill(PlayerBucketFillEvent event) {
1458        Block blockClicked = event.getBlockClicked();
1459        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(blockClicked.getLocation());
1460        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1461        if (area == null) {
1462            return;
1463        }
1464        Player player = event.getPlayer();
1465        BukkitPlayer plotPlayer = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
1466        Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
1467        if (plot == null) {
1468            if (plotPlayer.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_ROAD)) {
1469                return;
1470            }
1471            plotPlayer.sendMessage(
1472                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1473                    TagResolver.resolver("node", Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_ROAD))
1474            );
1475            event.setCancelled(true);
1476        } else if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
1477            if (plotPlayer.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_UNOWNED)) {
1478                return;
1479            }
1480            plotPlayer.sendMessage(
1481                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1482                    TagResolver.resolver(
1483                            "node",
1484                            Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_UNOWNED)
1485                    )
1486            );
1487            event.setCancelled(true);
1488        } else if (!plot.isAdded(plotPlayer.getUUID())) {
1489            if (plotPlayer.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER)) {
1490                return;
1491            }
1492            plotPlayer.sendMessage(
1493                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1494                    TagResolver.resolver(
1495                            "node",
1496                            Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER)
1497                    )
1498            );
1499            event.setCancelled(true);
1500        } else if (Settings.Done.RESTRICT_BUILDING && DoneFlag.isDone(plot)) {
1501            if (!plotPlayer.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER)) {
1502                plotPlayer.sendMessage(
1503                        TranslatableCaption.of("done.building_restricted")
1504                );
1505                event.setCancelled(true);
1506            }
1507        }
1508    }
