1510    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
1511    public void onHangingPlace(HangingPlaceEvent event) {
1512        Block block = event.getBlock().getRelative(event.getBlockFace());
1513        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation());
1514        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1515        if (area == null) {
1516            return;
1517        }
1518        Player p = event.getPlayer();
1519        if (p == null) {
1520            event.setCancelled(true);
1521            return;
1522        }
1523        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(p);
1524        Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
1525        if (plot == null) {
1526            if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_ROAD)) {
1527                pp.sendMessage(
1528                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1529                        TagResolver.resolver(
1530                                "node",
1531                                Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_ROAD)
1532                        )
1533                );
1534                event.setCancelled(true);
1535            }
1536        } else {
1537            if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
1538                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_UNOWNED)) {
1539                    pp.sendMessage(
1540                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1541                            TagResolver.resolver(
1542                                    "node",
1543                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_UNOWNED)
1544                            )
1545                    );
1546                    event.setCancelled(true);
1547                }
1548                return;
1549            }
1550            if (!plot.isAdded(pp.getUUID())) {
1551                if (!plot.getFlag(HangingPlaceFlag.class)) {
1552                    if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER)) {
1553                        pp.sendMessage(
1554                                TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1555                                TagResolver.resolver(
1556                                        "node",
1557                                        Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER)
1558                                )
1559                        );
1560                        event.setCancelled(true);
1561                    }
1562                    return;
1563                }
1564            }
1565            if (BukkitEntityUtil.checkEntity(event.getEntity(), plot)) {
1566                event.setCancelled(true);
1567            }
1568
1569        }
1570    }
1571
1572    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
1573    public void onHangingBreakByEntity(HangingBreakByEntityEvent event) {
1574        Entity remover = event.getRemover();
1575        if (remover instanceof Player p) {
1576            Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getEntity().getLocation());
1577            PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1578            if (area == null) {
1579                return;
1580            }
1581            BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(p);
1582            Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
1583            if (plot == null) {
1584                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_ROAD)) {
1585                    pp.sendMessage(
1586                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1587                            TagResolver.resolver(
1588                                    "node",
1589                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_ROAD)
1590                            )
1591                    );
1592                    event.setCancelled(true);
1593                }
1594            } else if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
1595                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_UNOWNED)) {
1596                    pp.sendMessage(
1597                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1598                            TagResolver.resolver(
1599                                    "node",
1600                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_UNOWNED)
1601                            )
1602                    );
1603                    event.setCancelled(true);
1604                }
1605            } else if (!plot.isAdded(pp.getUUID())) {
1606                if (plot.getFlag(HangingBreakFlag.class)) {
1607                    return;
1608                }
1609                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_OTHER)) {
1610                    pp.sendMessage(
1611                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1612                            TagResolver.resolver(
1613                                    "node",
1614                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_OTHER)
1615                            )
1616                    );
1617                    event.setCancelled(true);
1618                    plot.debug(p.getName()
1619                            + " could not break hanging entity because hanging-break = false");
1620                }
1621            }
1622        } else if (remover instanceof Projectile p) {
1623            if (p.getShooter() instanceof Player shooter) {
1624                Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getEntity().getLocation());
1625                PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1626                if (area == null) {
1627                    return;
1628                }
1629                BukkitPlayer player = BukkitUtil.adapt(shooter);
1630                Plot plot = area.getPlot(BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getEntity().getLocation()));
1631                if (plot != null) {
1632                    if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
1633                        if (!player.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_UNOWNED)) {
1634                            player.sendMessage(
1635                                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1636                                    TagResolver.resolver(
1637                                            "node",
1638                                            Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_UNOWNED)
1639                                    )
1640                            );
1641                            event.setCancelled(true);
1642                        }
1643                    } else if (!plot.isAdded(player.getUUID())) {
1644                        if (!plot.getFlag(HangingBreakFlag.class)) {
1645                            if (!player.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_OTHER)) {
1646                                player.sendMessage(
1647                                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1648                                        TagResolver.resolver(
1649                                                "node",
1650                                                Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_OTHER)
1651                                        )
1652                                );
1653                                event.setCancelled(true);
1654                                plot.debug(player.getName()
1655                                        + " could not break hanging entity because hanging-break = false");
1656                            }
1657                        }
1658                    }
1659                }
1660            }
1661        } else {
1662            event.setCancelled(true);
1663        }
1664    }
1665
1666    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
1667    public void onPlayerInteractEntity(PlayerInteractEntityEvent event) {
1668        if (event.getRightClicked().getType() == EntityType.UNKNOWN) {
1669            return;
1670        }
1671        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getRightClicked().getLocation());
1672        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1673        if (area == null) {
1674            return;
1675        }
1676        Player p = event.getPlayer();
1677        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(p);
1678        Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
1679        if (plot == null && !area.isRoadFlags()) {
1680            if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_ROAD)) {
1681                pp.sendMessage(
1682                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1683                        TagResolver.resolver(
1684                                "node",
1685                                Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_ROAD)
1686                        )
1687                );
1688                event.setCancelled(true);
1689            }
1690        } else if (plot != null && !plot.hasOwner()) {
1691            if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_UNOWNED)) {
1692                pp.sendMessage(
1693                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1694                        TagResolver.resolver(
1695                                "node",
1696                                Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_UNOWNED)
1697                        )
1698                );
1699                event.setCancelled(true);
1700            }
1701        } else if ((plot != null && !plot.isAdded(pp.getUUID())) || (plot == null && area
1702                .isRoadFlags())) {
1703            final Entity entity = event.getRightClicked();
1704            final com.sk89q.worldedit.world.entity.EntityType entityType =
1705                    BukkitAdapter.adapt(entity.getType());
1706
1707            FlagContainer flagContainer;
1708            if (plot == null) {
1709                flagContainer = area.getRoadFlagContainer();
1710            } else {
1711                flagContainer = plot.getFlagContainer();
1712            }
1713
1714            if (EntityCategories.HOSTILE.contains(entityType) && flagContainer
1715                    .getFlag(HostileInteractFlag.class).getValue()) {
1716                return;
1717            }
1718
1719            if (EntityCategories.ANIMAL.contains(entityType) && flagContainer
1720                    .getFlag(AnimalInteractFlag.class).getValue()) {
1721                return;
1722            }
1723
1724            // This actually makes use of the interface, so we don't use the
1725            // category
1726            if (entity instanceof Tameable && ((Tameable) entity).isTamed() && flagContainer
1727                    .getFlag(TamedInteractFlag.class).getValue()) {
1728                return;
1729            }
1730
1731            if (EntityCategories.VEHICLE.contains(entityType) && flagContainer
1732                    .getFlag(VehicleUseFlag.class).getValue()) {
1733                return;
1734            }
1735
1736            if (EntityCategories.PLAYER.contains(entityType) && flagContainer
1737                    .getFlag(PlayerInteractFlag.class).getValue()) {
1738                return;
1739            }
1740
1741            if (EntityCategories.INTERACTION.contains(entityType) && flagContainer
1742                    .getFlag(InteractionInteractFlag.class).getValue()) {
1743                return;
1744            }
1745
1746            if (EntityCategories.VILLAGER.contains(entityType) && flagContainer
1747                    .getFlag(VillagerInteractFlag.class).getValue()) {
1748                return;
1749            }
1750
1751            if ((EntityCategories.HANGING.contains(entityType) || EntityCategories.OTHER
1752                    .contains(entityType)) && flagContainer.getFlag(MiscInteractFlag.class)
1753                    .getValue()) {
1754                return;
1755            }
1756
1757            if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_OTHER)) {
1758                pp.sendMessage(
1759                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1760                        TagResolver.resolver(
1761                                "node",
1762                                Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_OTHER)
1763                        )
1764                );
1765                event.setCancelled(true);
1766            }
1767        }
1768    }
1769
1770    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
1771    public void onVehicleDestroy(VehicleDestroyEvent event) {
1772        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getVehicle().getLocation());
1773        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1774        if (area == null) {
1775            return;
1776        }
1777        Entity attacker = event.getAttacker();
1778        if (attacker instanceof Player p) {
1779            BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(p);
1780            Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
1781            if (plot == null) {
1782                if (!PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, VehicleBreakFlag.class, true) && !pp.hasPermission(
1783                        Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_VEHICLE_ROAD
1784                )) {
1785                    pp.sendMessage(
1786                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1787                            TagResolver.resolver(
1788                                    "node",
1789                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_VEHICLE_ROAD)
1790                            )
1791                    );
1792                    event.setCancelled(true);
1793                }
1794            } else {
1795                if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
1796                    if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_VEHICLE_UNOWNED)) {
1797                        pp.sendMessage(
1798                                TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1799                                TagResolver.resolver(
1800                                        "node",
1801                                        Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_VEHICLE_UNOWNED)
1802                                )
1803                        );
1804                        event.setCancelled(true);
1805                        return;
1806                    }
1807                    return;
1808                }
1809                if (!plot.isAdded(pp.getUUID())) {
1810                    if (plot.getFlag(VehicleBreakFlag.class)) {
1811                        return;
1812                    }
1813                    if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_VEHICLE_OTHER)) {
1814                        pp.sendMessage(
1815                                TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1816                                TagResolver.resolver(
1817                                        "node",
1818                                        Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_VEHICLE_OTHER)
1819                                )
1820                        );
1821                        event.setCancelled(true);
1822                        plot.debug(pp.getName()
1823                                + " could not break vehicle because vehicle-break = false");
1824                    }
1825                }
1826            }
1827        }
1828    }
1829
1830    @EventHandler
1831    public void onItemDrop(PlayerDropItemEvent event) {
1832        Player player = event.getPlayer();
1833        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
1834        Location location = pp.getLocation();
1835        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1836        if (area == null) {
1837            return;
1838        }
1839        Plot plot = location.getOwnedPlot();
1840        if (plot == null) {
1841            if (PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, ItemDropFlag.class, false)) {
1842                event.setCancelled(true);
1843            }
1844            return;
1845        }
1846        UUID uuid = pp.getUUID();
1847        if (!plot.isAdded(uuid)) {
1848            if (!plot.getFlag(ItemDropFlag.class)) {
1849                plot.debug(player.getName() + " could not drop item because of item-drop = false");
1850                event.setCancelled(true);
1851            }
1852        }
1853    }
1854
1855    @EventHandler
1856    public void onItemPickup(EntityPickupItemEvent event) {
1857        LivingEntity ent = event.getEntity();
1858        if (ent instanceof Player player) {
1859            BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
1860            Location location = pp.getLocation();
1861            PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1862            if (area == null) {
1863                return;
1864            }
1865            Plot plot = location.getOwnedPlot();
1866            if (plot == null) {
1867                if (PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, DropProtectionFlag.class, true)) {
1868                    event.setCancelled(true);
1869                }
1870                return;
1871            }
1872            UUID uuid = pp.getUUID();
1873            if (!plot.isAdded(uuid) && plot.getFlag(DropProtectionFlag.class)) {
1874                plot.debug(player.getName() + " could not pick up item because of drop-protection = true");
1875                event.setCancelled(true);
1876            }
1877        }
1878    }
1879
1880    @EventHandler
1881    public void onDeath(final PlayerDeathEvent event) {
1882        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getEntity().getLocation());
1883        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1884        if (area == null) {
1885            return;
1886        }
1887        Plot plot = location.getOwnedPlot();
1888        if (plot == null) {
1889            if (PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, KeepInventoryFlag.class, true)) {
1890                event.setCancelled(true);
1891            }
1892            return;
1893        }
1894        if (plot.getFlag(KeepInventoryFlag.class)) {
1895            plot.debug(event.getEntity().getName() + " kept their inventory because of keep-inventory = true");
1896            event.getDrops().clear();
1897            event.setKeepInventory(true);
1898        }
1899    }
1900
1901    @SuppressWarnings("deprecation") // #getLocate is needed for Spigot compatibility
1902    @EventHandler
1903    public void onLocaleChange(final PlayerLocaleChangeEvent event) {
1904        // The event is fired before the player is deemed online upon login
1905        if (!event.getPlayer().isOnline()) {
1906            return;
1907        }
1908        BukkitPlayer player = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getPlayer());
1909        // we're stripping the country code as we don't want to differ between countries
1910        player.setLocale(Locale.forLanguageTag(event.getLocale().substring(0, 2)));
1911    }
1912
1913    @EventHandler
1914    public void onPortalEnter(PlayerPortalEvent event) {
1915        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getPlayer().getLocation());
1916        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1917        if (area == null) {
1918            return;
1919        }
1920        Plot plot = location.getOwnedPlot();
1921        if (plot == null) {
1922            if (PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, DenyPortalTravelFlag.class, true)) {
1923                event.setCancelled(true);
1924            }
1925            return;
1926        }
1927        if (plot.getFlag(DenyPortalTravelFlag.class)) {
1928            plot.debug(event.getPlayer().getName() + " did not travel thru a portal because of deny-portal-travel = true");
1929            event.setCancelled(true);
1930        }
1931    }
1932
1933    @EventHandler
1934    public void onPortalCreation(PortalCreateEvent event) {
1935        String world = event.getWorld().getName();
1936        if (PlotSquared.get().getPlotAreaManager().getPlotAreasSet(world).size() == 0) {
1937            return;
1938        }
1939        BukkitPlayer pp = (event.getEntity() instanceof Player player) ? BukkitUtil.adapt(player) : null;
1940        int minX = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
1941        int maxX = Integer.MIN_VALUE;
1942        int minZ = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
1943        int maxZ = Integer.MIN_VALUE;
1944        for (BlockState state : event.getBlocks()) {
1945            minX = Math.min(state.getX(), minX);
1946            maxX = Math.max(state.getX(), maxX);
1947            minZ = Math.min(state.getZ(), minZ);
1948            maxZ = Math.max(state.getZ(), maxZ);
1949        }
1950        int y = event.getBlocks().get(0).getY(); // Don't need to worry about this too much
1951        for (Location location : List.of( // We don't care about duplicate locations
1952                Location.at(world, minX, y, minZ),
1953                Location.at(world, minX, y, maxZ),
1954                Location.at(world, maxX, y, minZ),
1955                Location.at(world, maxX, y, maxZ)
1956        )) {
1957            PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1958            if (area == null) {
1959                continue;
1960            }
1961            if (area.notifyIfOutsideBuildArea(pp, location.getY())) {
1962                event.setCancelled(true);
1963                return;
1964            }
1965            Plot plot = location.getOwnedPlot();
1966            if (plot == null) {
1967                if (PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, DenyPortalsFlag.class, true)) {
1968                    event.setCancelled(true);
1969                    return;
1970                }
1971                continue;
1972            }
1973            if (plot.getFlag(DenyPortalsFlag.class)) {
1974                StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder();
1975                if (event.getEntity() != null) {
1976                    builder.append(event.getEntity().getName()).append(" did not create a portal");
1977                } else {
1978                    builder.append("Portal creation cancelled");
1979                }
1980                plot.debug(builder.append(" because of deny-portals = true").toString());
1981                event.setCancelled(true);
1982                return;
1983            }
1984        }
1985    }
1986
1987    @EventHandler
1988    public void onPlayerTakeLecternBook(PlayerTakeLecternBookEvent event) {
1989        Player player = event.getPlayer();
1990        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
1991        Location location = pp.getLocation();
1992        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1993        if (area == null) {
1994            return;
1995        }
1996        Plot plot = location.getOwnedPlot();
1997        if (plot == null) {
1998            if (PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, LecternReadBookFlag.class, true)) {
1999                event.setCancelled(true);
2000            }
2001            return;
2002        }
2003        if (!plot.isAdded(pp.getUUID())) {
2004            if (plot.getFlag(LecternReadBookFlag.class)) {
2005                plot.debug(event.getPlayer().getName() + " could not take the book because of lectern-read-book = true");
2006                event.setCancelled(true);
2007            }
2008        }
2009    }
